page.title: 15TRAVEL TO WORK, WARGRAVE
page.content:
{DISTANCE Miles % {to } 0 - 5 16.5 {WORK } 6 -10 44 11-20 7.5 over 21 32 This confirms that Wargrave is a dormitory settlement. Indeed, only 13% of the sample work in the village.
